name: Sonic Grid
description:
This is a project created for the Sonic Fan Works game jam in celebration of Sonic the Hedgehog's 30th birthday. Sonic Grid is currently in alpha with 2 fully playable zones. The idea is to do more, but seeing as jams have deadlines I have posted it in it's current build.

While the game is playable in browser, it's not ideal unless you have speedy internet. A download is included below.

Thanks to the cool people at Sega for letting people play around with their blue boy.

Here's to 30 years of Sonic the Hedgehog.
